items.sentence: We\'ve recently put a new roof on our house.
I make it a rule never to eat between meals.
I should be able to do something about that.
I suspect that Tom and Mary are both sleepy.
This camera is less expensive than that one.
This flower is more beautiful than that one.
This is a much higher price than I expected.
If you don\'t hurry, you\'ll miss the train.
We haven\'t had those kinds of problems yet.
We haven\'t yet decided what to do tomorrow.
I\'ve forgotten the names of Tom\'s sisters.
I\'ve found something I\'d like to show you.
Tom told Mary she shouldn\'t do that inside.
Tom told everyone that I didn\'t want to go.
Tom told me he didn\'t like speaking French.
Tom told me he didn\'t want to study French.
My grandfather died in the Second World War.
My opinion is a little different from yours.
My wife and I always eat breakfast together.
Tom told me he wasn\'t going to wait for us.
